data.name: Optional Additional Payment #1 - (The Albino Hunter™)
data.detailed_description: This package adds nothing to the base game, but is instead an optional means of payment for those of you who want to pay me more. Yes, I have actually gotten requests for something like this.
data.about_the_game: This package adds nothing to the base game, but is instead an optional means of payment for those of you who want to pay me more. Yes, I have actually gotten requests for something like this.
data.short_description: This package adds nothing to the base game, but is instead an optional means of payment for those of you who want to pay me more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 64-bit Processor
  • Memory: 251 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
